snippet.title: Vendetta Games: Official Chalk River Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Deep within the Chalk River Wilderness, a sanctuary calls to the fearless.
The question stands, are you up for the challenge?

Like many stories of Vendetta, ours is a long and bloody one. It harks back to an era where dangers were as diverse as they were deadly—you could easily find yourself on the losing end of a bullet, become prey to a myriad of hazardous frontier creatures, or face human threats equally as lethal.

The metaverse we inhabit comprises the Township of Chalk River and surrounding areas, which just so happen to be teeming with outlaws, hustlers and folks who would shoot ya just as look at ya. Fortunately for us, we don't mind a good scrap, especially since our metaverse sits atop a fortune in precious metals and other natural resources; this territory has the measure to spawn wealth and fortune for those who are brave enough.

Website: https://www.vendettagames.ai/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/VendettaGamesHQ
Discord: https://discord.gg/AcBrF8JNF7

#ChalkRiver #VendettaGames #OfficialTrailer #gamerelease  #web3
